scripts.migrate: export MIGRATIONS_DEEPLINKS_APP_URL=localhost:3007; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0; export MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; (cd node_modules/@deepcase/deeplinks; npm run unmigrate; npm run migrate;)
scripts.build: NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEP_FOUNDATION_HASURA_RELATIVE=1 NEXT_PUBLIC_DEEPLINKS_SERVER='' NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_SSL=1 NEXT_PUBLIC_HASURA_PATH=hasura PORT=$NEXTPORT next build
